archimate:Goal.name: Component Analysis Requirements V5
archimate:Goal.documentation: Component Analysis is the process of identifying potential areas of risk from the use of third-party and open-source software components. Every component, direct or transitive, is a candidate for analysis. Risk inherited through the use of third-party software may directly affect the application or systems that rely on them. - Known Vulnerabilities - Component Version Currency - Component Type - Component Function - Component Quantity - License
